files.description: Setup script for the Quran search application. Uses setuptools to configure package details, version, packages, and installation requirements.
List of package requirements for the Quran search application. Currently empty, serving as a placeholder for future dependencies.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Contains functions to read, parse, and return Quran verses as a list of dictionaries.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file and parses each line formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

functions.name: load_quran_data
functions.description: Alias for load_quran_text, providing backward compatibility for loading Quran data.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Contains functions to search and analyze Quran verses using textual and gematrical metrics.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided Quran data and checks if the search word is present in the verse text.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses. Checks for the exact phrase in verses.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data. Returns verses where the word is found in the specified Surah.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word group (phrase) within a given Surah of the Quran data. Returns verses containing the phrase in the specified Surah.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word in the entire Quran text data using case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word whose occurrences need to be counted.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences_in_surah
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a specific word within the specified Surah in the Quran data.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to count occurrences for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number in which to count the occurrences.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences_in_verse_range
functions.description: Count the total occurrences of a specific word within a defined verse range in the Quran data.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to be counted.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Starting verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Ending verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word within a specified verse range in the Quran and return matching verses.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Starting verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Ending verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word group (phrase) within a specified verse range in the Quran and return matching verses.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Starting verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Ending verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Search for Quran verses that contain exactly the specified number of words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact number of words the verse should contain.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the number of words is a multiple of a specified number. Raises ValueError if multiple_of is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The integer multiple to check against.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_equals_first_word_gematrical_value
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the total number of words equals the gematrical value of the first word in the verse.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to determine if the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the gematrical (Abjad) value of a given Arabic word or phrase using standard Abjad numeral mapping.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: An Arabic word or phrase.

functions.name: search_words_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Search for words in the Quran that have the specified gematrical value.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

functions.name: search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Search for word groups in the Quran that have a specific gematrical value. Returns verses if the computed value matches the target.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to search for.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_word_count
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the gematrical value of a specified word group equals the total word count of the verse.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to evaluate.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: calculate_surah_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the total gematrical value of all words within a specified Surah.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number for which the value is calculated.

functions.name: calculate_verse_range_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the total gematrical value for verses in the specified overall verse number range.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: start_verse_num
parameters.description: The starting overall verse number (inclusive).

parameters.name: end_verse_num
parameters.description: The ending overall verse number (inclusive).

functions.name: calculate_quran_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the total gematrical value of the entire Quran by summing the values of all verses.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_at_position
functions.description: Search for verses where the specified word appears at the given 1-indexed position.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for at a specific position.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The 1-indexed position to check in the verse.

functions.name: search_word_group_at_position
functions.description: Search for verses where the specified word group appears starting at the given 1-indexed position.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to search for.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The 1-indexed position to look for the word group.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_verse_number
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the gematrical value of the specified word equals the verse number (ayah_number).

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to evaluate.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_group_gematrical_value_equals_verse_number
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the gematrical value of the specified word group equals the verse number (ayah_number).

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to evaluate.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to True.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_surah_number
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the gematrical value of the specified word equals the surah number.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to evaluate.

parameters.name: case_sensitive

functions.name: search_verses_by_verse_gematrical_value_equals
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the total gematrical value of all words equals the target value.

parameters.name: target_value

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran Secrets Analyzer. This script performs a comprehensive analysis of the Quran text to uncover potential secrets. The results are logged to analysis_results.log in the project root.

functions.name: main
functions.description:
Main function to perform a comprehensive analysis of the Quran.
    
    This function loads the Quran data and performs a series of analyses, including:
      - Keyword search
      - Word group search
      - Gematrical value analysis
      - Word count analysis
      - Positional search
      - Range search
      - Combinatorial search
      - Additional gematrical vs. structure analyses
      
    All results are logged to the analysis_results.log file.

files.description: Initializer file for the tests package. Marks the directory as a Python package for unit tests.

Unit tests for the quran_search module. This file contains various test cases to validate the functionality of search functions in quran_search.py, covering word search, word group search, gematrical value calculations, and verse analysis.

classes.name: TestQuranSearch
classes.description: Test suite for various Quran search functionalities, including word search, group search, gematrical value analysis, and verse range searches.

methods.name: test_search_allah_word
methods.description: Test that searching for the word 'اللَّهِ' returns at least one verse using case-insensitive search.

methods.name: test_search_word_group
methods.description:
Test the search_word_group function.

        Scenario 1: Searching for an existing word group "رَبِّ العٰلَمينَ" should return at least one verse,
                    and the first result should correspond to verse 1:2 and contain the searched word group.
        Scenario 2: Searching for a non-existing word group should return an empty list.

methods.name: test_case_insensitive_search_word
methods.description: Test the search_word_in_quran function in case-insensitive mode using a dummy dataset.

methods.name: test_case_sensitive_search_word
methods.description: Test the search_word_in_quran function in case-sensitive mode using a dummy dataset.

methods.name: test_case_insensitive_search_word_group
methods.description: Test the search_word_group function in case-insensitive mode using a dummy dataset.

methods.name: test_case_sensitive_search_word_group
methods.description: Test the search_word_group function in case-sensitive mode using a dummy dataset.

methods.name: test_search_word_in_surah
methods.description:
Test the search_word_in_surah function for a specific Surah.

        Scenario 1: Search for a word that exists in the specified Surah.
        Scenario 2: Search for a word that does not exist in the specified Surah.
        Also verifies case-insensitive search behavior.

methods.name: test_search_word_group_in_surah
methods.description:
Test the search_word_group_in_surah function for various scenarios:

        - Scenario 1: Search for a word group that exists in a specific Surah (case-insensitive).
        - Scenario 2: Search for a word group that exists multiple times in a specific Surah.
        - Scenario 3: Search for a non-existent word group in a Surah.
        - Scenario 4: Verify case-sensitive search differentiates correctly.
        - Scenario 5: Ensure that filtering by a Surah number with no entries returns an empty list.

methods.name: test_count_word_occurrences
methods.description:
Test the count_word_occurrences function to ensure it correctly counts the total occurrences
        of a given word in the Quran data, handling case-insensitivity.

methods.name: test_count_word_group_occurrences
methods.description:
Test the count_word_group_occurrences function to ensure it correctly counts the total occurrences
        of a given word group (phrase) in the Quran data, handling case-insensitivity and multiple occurrences.

methods.name: test_count_word_occurrences_in_surah
methods.description:
Test the count_word_occurrences_in_surah function by ensuring it correctly counts occurrences of a word
        within a specific Surah, in a case-insensitive manner.

methods.name: test_count_word_occurrences_in_verse_range
methods.description:
Test the count_word_occurrences_in_verse_range function to ensure it correctly counts occurrences
        of a word within a specified verse range, handling both case-sensitive and case-insensitive modes.

methods.name: test_search_word_in_verse_range
methods.description:
Test the search_word_in_verse_range function for various scenarios:

        - Searching for a word that exists within a specific verse range.
        - Searching for a word that does not exist within the range.
        - Searching with different verse ranges spanning multiple surahs and within a single surah.
        - Testing both case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches.
        - Testing edge case where start_verse and end_verse are the same.

methods.name: test_search_word_group_in_verse_range
methods.description:
Test the search_word_group_in_verse_range function for various scenarios:

        - Searching for an existing word group within a specific verse range.
        - Searching using case-insensitive mode.
        - Searching using case-sensitive mode.
        - Searching across surah boundaries.
        - Edge case where start_verse and end_verse are the same.
        - Searching for a non-existent word group.

methods.name: test_search_verses_by_word_count
methods.description:
Test that the search_verses_by_word_count function returns only verses with the exact specified word count.

        This test creates a temporary dummy Quran data file with controlled verses and verifies that
        only verses with exactly 19 words are returned.

methods.name: test_search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
methods.description:
Test that the search_verses_by_word_count_multiple function returns only verses with word counts
        that are multiples of the specified number.

        This test includes:
        - A positive test case using a dummy dataset where some verses have word counts that are multiples of the given number.
        - A negative test case where a multiple_of value yields no matching verses.
        - Verification that a ValueError is raised when multiple_of is zero.

methods.name: test_calculate_gematrical_value
methods.description:
Test the calculate_gematrical_value function with various scenarios,
        including an empty string, known Arabic words/phrases, and non-mapping characters.

methods.name: test_search_words_by_gematrical_value
methods.description:
Test the search_words_by_gematrical_value function with various scenarios,
        ensuring that words are correctly identified based on their gematrical value.

        Scenarios tested:
        - Target gematrical value of 66 for the word 'الله'.
        - Target gematrical value of 10 for the word 'ابجد'.
        - Target gematrical value of 0 for words with no mapped values (e.g., 'test').
        - Target gematrical value of 571 for the word 'مثال'.

methods.name: test_search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value
methods.description:
Test the search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value function with various scenarios,
        ensuring that it returns verses where the specified word group is found and its gematrical value matches the target.

        Scenarios:
        - When the word group gem value matches the target and occurs in verses.
        - When the target gem value does not match, should return an empty result.
        - When the word group does not occur in any verse, should return an empty list.

methods.name: test_calculate_surah_gematrical_value
methods.description:
Test the calculate_surah_gematrical_value function by using a dummy Quran data set.
        This test includes verses from different Surahs, ensuring that only verses from the specified Surah contribute
        to the calculated gematrical value.

methods.name: test_calculate_verse_range_gematrical_value
methods.description:
Test the calculate_verse_range_gematrical_value function by manually summing gematrical values
        for a defined verse range.

        This test loads the Quran data using load_quran_data, calculates the expected cumulative gematrical
        value for verses from verse number 1 to 5 (inclusive), and asserts that the function returns the expected value.

methods.name: test_calculate_quran_gematrical_value
methods.description:
Test the calculate_quran_gematrical_value function by monkey-patching the calculate_gematrical_value to return
        predictable values (using the length of the input text) and using dummy Quran data.

methods.name: test_search_word_at_position
methods.description:
Test the search_word_at_position function for various scenarios:

        - When the target word appears at the specified position (case-insensitive).
        - When the target word does not appear at that position.
        - When the specified position is invalid (greater than number of words).

methods.name: test_search_word_group_at_position
methods.description:
Test the search_word_group_at_position function for various scenarios:

        - Case-insensitive search: Searching for "quick brown" starting at position 2 should match verses 1, 2, and 3.
          In these verses, the 2nd and 3rd words form the phrase "quick brown" in a case-insensitive manner.
        - Case-sensitive search: Searching for "quick Brown" starting at position 1 should match only verse 4,
          since only verse 4 begins with the exact case-sensitive phrase "quick Brown".
        - Out-of-bounds position: Searching for a phrase with insufficient words from the given position should return no matches.
        - No match scenario: Searching for a phrase that does not appear at the specified position should return an empty list.

methods.name: test_search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_word_count
methods.description:
Test the search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_word_count function for correct verse retrieval.

        Scenarios:
        - Target word "ب" has a gematrical value of 2, so verses with exactly 2 words should be returned.
        - Target word "ا" has a gematrical value of 1, so verses with exactly 1 word should be returned.
        - Target word "ج" has a gematrical value of 3, so verses with exactly 3 words should be returned.
        - Target word "د" has a gematrical value of 4, so no verse with 4 words should be returned.
        Also tests both case-insensitive (default) and case-sensitive searches.

methods.name: test_search_verses_by_word_group_gematrical_value_equals_verse_number
methods.description:
Test the search_verses_by_word_group_gematrical_value_equals_verse_number function for various scenarios:

        - Scenario 1: When the word group "ب" (gematrical value = 2) is present in verses with ayah_number 2.
        - Scenario 2: When the word group "ج" (gematrical value = 3) does not yield any matching verses.
        Tests both case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches.

methods.name: test_search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_surah_number
methods.description:
Test the search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_surah_number function for various scenarios:

        - Case-insensitive search: Searching for "test" (gematrical value from fake function = 1) should return verses with surah number 1.
        - Case-sensitive search: Searching for "Test" should return no results if exact casing does not match.
        - Additional tests for words "Alpha" and "beta" with gematrical values 2 and 3 respectively.

methods.name: test_search_verses_by_verse_gematrical_value_equals
methods.description:
Test the search_verses_by_verse_gematrical_value_equals function.

        Creates a dummy Quran data set with verses of known gematrical values and verifies that the function
        returns the correct verses for given target gematrical values.

methods.name: test_search_verses_by_word_count_equals_first_word_gematrical_value
methods.description:
Test that the search_verses_by_word_count_equals_first_word_gematrical_value function returns
        the verses where the total number of words equals the gematrical value of the first word.

        Uses a dummy dataset:
          - Verse "ا" qualifies because gem(ا)=1 and word count=1.
          - Verse "ب extra" qualifies because gem(ب)=2 and word count=2.
          - Verse "ا extra" does not qualify because gem(ا)=1 but word count=2.
          - Verse "ب" does not qualify because gem(ب)=2 but word count=1.
          - Verse "ج one two" qualifies because gem(ج)=3 and word count=3.
        Tests are done for both case_sensitive True and False.

classes.name: TestMainIntegration
classes.description: Test suite for main function integration. Contains integration tests to verify the end-to-end functionality of the main program entry point.

methods.name: test_main_function
methods.description:
Integration test for the main function.

        Executes main() and verifies that analysis_results.log is created and contains expected log entries.

files.description: Data file containing Quran text in Uthmani script. Each line is formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.

Documentation for the Quran Secrets Analyzer application. Provides an overview of features including keyword searches, gematrical value analysis, and instructions for running the analysis and viewing log files.
